mapper.select: SELECT W.WISH_ID, W.MEMBER_ID, W.PROD_ID, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, P.PROD_SELLER, P.PROD_STOCK, I.IMG_PATH AS PROD_IMG_PATH FROM WISHLIST_DB W JOIN PRODUCT_DB P ON W.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN IMAGE_DB I ON P.PROD_ID = I.IMG_PROD_ID AND I.IS_MAIN = 'Y' WHERE W.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY W.WISH_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST_DB (WISH_ID, MEMBER_ID, PROD_ID, WISH_DATE) VALUES (WISHLIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{prodId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISHLIST_DB WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}
